import { useState } from "react" import {Form, Row, Col, InputGroup, Container, Button} from "react-bootstrap" import {roomName, roomType, validation} from "../Utils/validation" import {createNewRoom} from "../DAL/roomApi" import {decodeJwtToken} from "../Utils/function" function CreateRoom(){ const {id} = decodeJwtToken() const [roomDetails, setRoomDetails] = useState({ roomName, roomType }) async function submit(e){ e.preventDefault() let isValid = true let room = {id} for (const key in roomDetails) { room[key] = roomDetails[key].value setRoomDetails(validation({value:roomDetails[key].value,name:key},roomDetails)) if (roomDetails[key].errors.length !==0){ isValid = false } } if(isValid){ const {message} = await createNewRoom(room) } } return<>

Create Room

{setRoomDetails(validation(e.target, roomDetails))}}/> {roomDetails["roomName"].errors.map((value,index)=> {return {value} })} setRoomDetails(validation(e.target, roomDetails))}> {roomDetails["roomType"].errors.map((value,index)=> {return {value} })}
} export default CreateRoom
